__e: I'm on furlough this week, and everybody's out dancing with their girl... - and I'm home sitting with Mom.
Not your buddies, not your girlfriends, not your wife, if you're lucky enough to find the right woman and get married.

I would love to believe in a universe... where you wake up and you don't have to go to work... and you step outside and meet two beautiful 18-year-old sisters... who are also girlfriends... and... are also very nice people.
